definition: to open (a door)/to open up (for development)/to dispel/to refute/to repudiate

lit. cut sleeve (idiom); fig. euphemism for homosexuality, originating from History of Western Han 漢書|汉书: emperor Han Aidi (real name Liu Xin) was in bed with his lover Dong Xian, and had to attend a court audience that morning. Not wishing to awaken Dong Xian, who was sleeping with his head resting on the emperor's long robe sleeve, Aidi used a knife to cut off the lower half of his sleeve.
to have strange and dangerous addictions (idiom)

sentences.english: "Other than pedophilia, it's the most secretive behavior I've encountered, " says Charles Yesalis, a Penn State University professor who has studied steroid use for 28 years.
sentences.chinese: 除了恋童癖外，这是我遇到过最秘密的行为了。

sentences.english: I have a weakness for flowers and often boiled tea under them.
sentences.chinese: 余负花癖，与秋芙常煮茗其下。

sentences.english: We have a ban on the propaganda of homosexuality and paedophilia.
sentences.chinese: 我们禁止对于同性恋和恋童癖的宣传。

sentences.english: A psychological reason for asserting "wild" generalizations is exhibitionism .
sentences.chinese: 进行“任意”概括的一个心理上的因素是表现癖。
它使一个恋童癖人性化。
这种现象，有时叫做流浪癖。

sentences.english: Why Do People Have Foot Fetishes?
sentences.chinese: 为什么有些人会有恋足癖？

sentences.english: Dr. Townsend was a drug addict.
sentences.chinese: 汤森特医生是个嗜药成癖的瘾君子。

sentences.english: Are you aware you're living with a pedophile ?
sentences.chinese: 你知道你跟一个恋童癖住在一起吗？

sentences.english: When we met, you warned me of your wanderlust.
sentences.chinese: 但我们相遇之时，你就警告我说你有漫游癖。

sentences.english: My opinion on that is that both food addiction and sex addiction are very real.
sentences.chinese: 我的看法是，嗜食症或性瘾癖是相当真实的。

sentences.english: Catholic Church and is pledging to work to make sure pedophiles do not become priests.
sentences.chinese: 他誓言采取行动确保有虐童癖的人不会成为神父。

sentences.english: Kevin was playing a 12)pedophile who is released from jail.
sentences.chinese: 凯文扮演了一个刑满释放的恋童癖，饱受牢狱之苦。

sentences.english: Chewing on wood, can progress to the more serious condition of cribbing and wind sucking.
sentences.chinese: 啃木头的行为可能发展成更严重的咬槽癖和咽气癖。

sentences.english: Chewing on wood, can progress to the more serious condition of cribbing and wind sucking.
sentences.chinese: 啃木头的行为可能发展成更严重的咬槽癖和咽气癖。

sentences.english: There was a faraway hint of wanderlust in his expression.
sentences.chinese: 在他的话语中恍惚地暗示他有旅行癖。

definition: addicted to/fond of/stem corresponding to -phil or -phile
